Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility and internal flight alternative (IFA) findings
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative due to inconsistent statements, omitted details, and falsified documents
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Persecution related to land dispute in India
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Substantial inconsistencies and lack of credibility
Crimes.Application_Error: Misrepresentation through falsified documents and omissions
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Medical certificates deemed irrelevant due to contradictions
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Justification, transparency, and intelligibility in decision-making
Crimes.Application_Factor: Omission of brother’s existence and father’s address
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of credibility and IFA findings
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Credibility concerns and availability of internal flight alternative
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradictions in dates of detentions and sexual assault allegations
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Assessed as met by the Board
